Articles.Content:
Hallo all I hope you are able to help me.

 

I am planing KSP with 88 Mods install and it is running good, but I did have one time where the game failed, As i was trying to unlock the node Second Gen Capsules, and i think that it happen in kerbal construction time, as i have lost some rockets that was ready when the game fail now and then, can any one help me fix this as i like to get in to manned flight 

 

Thx for taking the time to help
